name: Bandle
description:
My name is Kyle and I created this game for a school project. The orginal plan was to create a local brawler game but it grew into a bigger game. If you want to play a beat em up game with your friends or play versus online players, this is the game for you. Thank you for playing, I would love to hear your opinion!

Known Bugs

  • Arrow shooting does no damage
  • Hanging against the wall, multiplayer issue
